title: Best of The Program | 10/4/21
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the gap between the vaccinated and unvaccinated. Glenn discusses the importance of truth and the balance of power. Glenn and Stu talk about Sen. Kyrsten Sinema being berated in a public bathroom by immigration activists. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
